name: Double Down
description:
Play an intense game of solo card sorting! Battling with the classics like Solitaire and FreeCell, there's a new game on the market! Introducing Double Down!

Pair cards with opposite colors and increasing ranks, build towers! It's a card game! It's free! Challenge your friends to beat your scores by playing the same seeded games!

Rules are included in the README. Linux and Mac support may vary.
